attributes.action: Drop the V.A.T charge on vehicle tyres.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think we should drop at least the V.A.T (if not the price) on vehicle tyres. As we already pay vehicle road tax. My reason's for are the bad condition of many road's in the UK. Witch are not being fixed,or replaced therefore bad conditioned road's mean's shortend life of our tyres, witch are highly priced already.
